long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: We are not affiliated, associated, or in any way officially connected with Netflix, Inc., or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates.

Netflix Comments seamlessly embeds a comments section into Netflixâ„¢, making your experience watching shows more fun and social! 
Installing the extension will add an icon in the top right corner of the Netflix player. Hover on it to read and post comments.

*Time-specific comments: comments are linked to where in the show's timeline they were posted. If you posted a comment at minute 3, it will only be visible to other people after they reach minute 3.

*Spoiler protection: spoilers are automatically blurred out until they're safe to read. Thanks to our reporting system, comments that violate our Code of Conduct are quickly taken down.

*No need to sign-up: a unique name is automatically assigned to you when you first watch a show on Netflix with the extension installed. You can start commenting right away.

*Join the discussion: see where the latest comments where posted from the Trending tab and join fellow commenters.
